reviewText: Assuming you really like the Three Stooges, you'll enjoy this collection of live-action bits combined with cartoons. While the 'toons are ok, the live-action sequences are very special vignettes starring Larry, Moe and Curly-Joe. Although most of this material has been around for a while and I've collected a number of versions, this is the best-looking DVD I've seen. ACME-TV has enhanced it and it's never looked better. For die-hard Stooge fans, this is the one to get.
